mapper.select: SELECT u.id,u.total_dynamic,p.flag ,p.depth,p.relation_id,p.trigger_time,p.money FROM s_user as u ,t_prize as p where u.id=#{user_id} and u.id=p.user_id ORDER BY p.trigger_time DESC
SELECT a.*,1 moCount, (SELECT count(1) FROM s_user b where b.pid=a.id) teamCount FROM s_user a where a.pid=#{user_id} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

SELECT
(SELECT count(1) FROM s_user WHERE pid=#{user_id}) ztslqb,
(SELECT count(1) FROM s_user WHERE pid=#{user_id} and total_static>0) ztslhg,
(SELECT count(1) FROM s_user WHERE path like (SELECT CONCAT(path,',%') from s_user where id=#{user_id})) tdslqb,
(SELECT count(1) FROM s_user WHERE path like (SELECT CONCAT(path,',%') from s_user where id=#{user_id}) and total_static>0) tdslhg
